document.docAuthor: Botelho, Alessandra Prates, Silva, Maria Cristina Da, Sobral, Luciana Davina Tosta & Fonsêca-Genevois, Verônica Gomes
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Sabatieria Rouville (Nematoda: Comesomatidae) with conical-cylindrical tails, from Campos Basin, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil *

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Sabatieria Rouville (Nematoda: Comesomatidae) with conical-cylindrical tails, from Campos Basin, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil *

subSubSection.paragraph:
The list of valid species is divided by groups of
Sabatieria
, according to
Platt ( 1985 )
, and the recent descriptions of
Gourbault & Vincx ( 1990 )
,
Muthumbi et al. ( 1997 )
,
Chen & Vincx ( 1999 )
,
Chen & Vincx ( 2000 )
, Pastor de
Ward ( 2003 )
,
Huang & Zhang ( 2006 )
and Botelho et al. ( 2007 ).

Sabatieria praedatrix
-group: S. alata Warwick

S. flecha Pastor
de Ward
S. granifer Wieser

S. paraspiculata Botelho et al.
S. sanjosensis Pastor de Ward
S. spiculata Botelho et al.
S. stekhoveni Vitiello

Sabatieria armata
-group:
S. armata Gerlack

Sabatieria pulchra
-group:
S. breviseta Stekhoven
S. mortenseni (Ditlevsen)
S. propisinna Vitiello

Sabatieria celtica
-group:
S. celtica
Southern
S. furcillata Wieser
S. kelletti Platt

Sabatieria ornata
-group:
S. abyssalis (Filipjev)
Species incertae sedis :

S. antarctica Cobb
doubtful by Wieser

S. arctica (Allgén)
doubtful by Platt

S. arcuata Wieser
doubtful by Platt

S. aspera Sergeeva
inquirendae by Platt

S. australis Allgén
doubtful by Platt

S. cettensis Rouville
doubtful by Filipjev and Wieser
S. cleopatris Micoletzky
doubtful by Platt

S. effilata Stekhoven
inquirendae by Platt

S. filicaudata Allgén
doubtful by Wieser

S. heterospiculum Allgén
doubtful by Platt

S. heterura (Cobb)
nec Wieser doubtful by Platt
S. jubata Cobb
doubtful by Platt

S. kolaensis (Ssaweljev)
doubtful by Platt

S. mawsoni Wieser
doubtful by Platt

S. norwegica Allgén
incertae sedis by Wieser doubtful by Platt
S. paravulgaris Filipjev
doubtful by Platt

S. pellucida Allgén
doubtful by Platt

S. possjetica Platonova
inquirendae by Platt
S. praebosporica Sergeeva
inquirendae by Platt
S. quadripapillata Filipjev
inquirendae by Platt
S. rota Gerlach
inquirendae Platt

S. rotundicauda Allgén
doubtful by Platt

S. taboguillensis (Allgén)
doubtful by Wieser and by Platt
S. tenuicaudata (Bastian)
doubtful by Wieser and by Platt
S. tenuiseta Allgén
inquirendae by Jensen and doubtful by Platt
S. tubilaima Allgén
inquirendae by Jensen and doubtful by Platt
S. wieseri Platt
S. heterura sensu Wieser
nom. nov. (Platt)
